    Modifier and Type Method Description
    recipes RecipeServiceImpl.createRecipe​(recipes recipe)
    This method takes entity body recipe .
    recipes RecipeServiceImpl.deleteRecipe​(java.lang.Integer recipeId)
    This method takes recipe id as an input , checks weather recipe is present or not, if recipe is present in database ,recipe gets deleted if recipe is not present exception is thrown
    recipes RecipeServiceImpl.getRecipe​(java.lang.String recipeName)
    this method takes recipe-name as input.
    recipes RecipeServiceImpl.updateRecipe​(java.lang.Integer recipeId, recipes recipe)
    This method takes recipe id ,and updated recipe entity, checks weather recipe is present in database or not.
